name: Chet Burkley is Out of Time
name_original: Chet Burkley is Out of Time
description:
A short platformer where the flow of time is only a suggestion. Navigate a dangerous abandoned mine on a distant alien moon at the behest of forces beyond human comprehension.

Made in 6 days for Global MoonJam.

Theme: Time

***  use the Jump input to advance the slides at the beginning ***

Credits:

Programming, art, animation, level design, music by me.

Sound effects used all came from this pack: https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-16-bit-mini-pack

Font is Pixel Operator Monospace 8px: https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/pixel-operator

Tools:

Game engine is Godot 3.4.4: https://godotengine.org/

Music created using Bosca Ceoil: https://boscaceoil.net/

Audio editing of any kind done with Audacity: https://www.audacityteam.org/

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/intlticket
